printer

Class HTMLPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • printer.HTMLPrinter

  • public class HTMLPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which provides tools to write images to HTML files. Might be useful in printing higher quality images.

    • Method Detail

      • generateHTMLFile

        public static void generateHTMLFile(java.lang.String filename,
                    java.lang.Boolean useTwoColumns,
                    java.lang.Boolean printFriendly,
                    java.lang.String pathToBallotVVPATFolder,
                    AuditoriumParams ballotConstants,
                    java.lang.String ballotID,
                    java.lang.String barcodeFilePath,
                    java.lang.String lineSeparatorFilePath,
                    java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> imageNames)
        Generates a HTML file that will be used to print a voter's selections.
        Parameters:
        filename - - The name of the HTML file to be written
        useTwoColumns - - Whether or not to use two columns of images per page
        printFriendly - - Whether or not to generate a printer-friendly HTML file. If true, then the HTML file will contain no colours and only black text on a white background.
        pathToBallotVVPATFolder - - The path to the vvpat folder in the ballot files
        ballotConstants - - The object that contains ballot parameters (such as election name)
        ballotID - - The ID of the ballot
        barcodeFilePath - - The path to the barcode file.
        lineSeparatorFilePath - - The path to the line separator file. This can be a 10x10 solid black PNG. The HTML code resizes it to the correct dimensions.
        imageNames - - ArrayLists of file names for images. One ArrayList per column.

      • generatorHelperForTwoColumns

        private static void generatorHelperForTwoColumns(java.io.BufferedWriter writer,
                                java.lang.Boolean printFriendly,
                                java.lang.String pathToBallotVVPATFolder,
                                java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> imageNames)
        Creates a "page" that contains two columns of images.
        Parameters:
        writer - - The writer to the HTML file
        printFriendly - - Whether or not to generate a printer-friendly HTML file. If true, then the HTML file will contain no colours and only black text on a white background.
        pathToBallotVVPATFolder - - The path to the vvpat folder in the ballot files
        imageNames - - ArrayLists of file names for images. One ArrayList per column.

        private static void generatorHelperForOneColumn(java.io.BufferedWriter writer,
                               java.lang.Boolean printFriendly,

        pathToBallotVVPATFolder - - The path to the vvpat folder in the ballot files
        imageNames - - ArrayLists of file names for images. One ArrayList per column.
